    • scaledGeometryReductionIntersection

      public static org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry scaledGeometryReductionIntersection​(java.util.List<org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry> geoms)
      Make an intersection of a list of Geometry and catch TopologyException to redo the intersection with a reduced precision. Precision reduction comes from 2 to 1000.
      Parameters:
      geoms - List of Geometry
      Returns:
      the intersected Geometry
